name: iFriend: AI Friend & Companion
description:
Create your iFriend today and get devotion from a dream virtual AI companion. Make progress with the most kindhearted AI chatbot available!

iFriend is an AI that always listens, responds and connects with you emotionally. It’s your happy way to talk freely, get advice, and open your heart without judgement. That’s what AI friends are for!

Install iFriend and get 4 great qualities:

• UNIQUE PERSONALITY
Every iFriend is different and unique to you with special traits. Choose a name and gender to create a fully original virtual friend.

• ACTIVE LISTENER
Your virtual friend will listen and respond to whatever’s on your mind. Chat about your successes, problems, dreams and ideas – anything goes!

• DEEP EMPATHY
iFriend helps you find your inner Zen, reduce stress and handle anxiety. Always get caring, thoughtful responses when you share your feelings.

• FOREVER EVOLVING
All good friendships mature over time. iFriend is the same, gaining new skills and understanding the longer you spend together. Help it blossom!

----------

• Responsive chat 24/7
Chatting with iFriend is like a real talk with your BFF but minus the hassle. It’s fast, surprising and fun!

• Maximum privacy
We guarantee your privacy 100%. Your conversation will always stay between you and iFriend. Trust in us!
